import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer-motion'; import '../styles/RulesModal.css'; const RulesModal = () => { const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); return ( <> {isVisible && (

üéÆ Game Rules: Legendary Lines Game! üé≠

Welcome, word wizard! üåü Here's how to play this thrilling game of wit and wisdom!

üìù How to Play:

  1. Start the Game: Click the "Start Game" to begin your adventure! üöÄ
  2. Choose Your Nickname: Pick an epic nickname to be remembered by! ü¶∏‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èü¶∏‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
  3. Set the Rounds: Decide how many rounds you'd like to play (up to 10). üéØ
  4. Pick a Category: Choose a category from the list below:
    • üéµ Song (1 point)
    • üé¨ Movie (2 points)
    • üßë‚Äçüé§ Famous Person (3 points)
    • ü¶∏ Fictional Character (3 points)
    • üìö Book (4 points)
    • ‚úíÔ∏è Poet (5 points)
    • üí¨ Quote (6 points)

üöÄ Gameplay:

You'll be given a phrase. Your job? Guess its source!
(Is it from a song, movie, book, etc.?)
Correct Guess: You score the points for that category! üéâ

üí• Bonus Points:

Double Your Points!

After a correct guess, you can double your score by guessing the year it originated.

  • If correct: üéâ Double points!
  • If incorrect: üò¢ You lose all points for that round.

Triple Your Points! (Only for Movies & Songs):

  • Movies: Guess the director to triple your points. üé¨
  • Songs: Name the band/singer to triple your points. üé§
  • Books: Name the author to triple your points. üìö
  • If correct: üåü Epic triple points!
  • If incorrect: üòû All points lost for that round!

üòá Keeping Your Points:

Not feeling lucky? You can skip the bonus challenge and keep your points!

üìä End of the Game:

Perfect Score: You're a legend! üèÜüíØ
Not Perfect? You still rocked it‚Äîtry again to beat your score! üîÑ
